review: I love the Chromecast.  I can stream just about anything to my TV from my android tablet or my windows 7 PC.  not a lot of options for OTHER services.  I also have a SONY Media Player, and on that i can stream netflix, huku, pandora, Amazon Prime and a whole bunch more.  The Chromesast isnt like that.  it is the STREAMER part of things - doesnt do anything with content you dont send it from another device.  It opens up your other devices to stream to your TV, but doesnt let you hit content by itself like a SONY or apple TV, etc.

review: Reliable and fast. I connect to Netflix through Chromecast because it has no buffering issues. Connecting to Netflix via my Sony Blueray DVD player, I experienced serious buffering issues.
